original_text: And the nations of them which are saved shall walk in the light of it: and the kings of the earth do bring their glory and honour into it.
korean_text: 만국이 그 빛 가운데로 다니고 땅의 왕들이 자기 영광을 가지고 그리로 들어가리라

sentences.original_text: And nations of them which are saved
shall walk in the light of it:
and the kings of the earth
do bring their glory and honour into it.
